sections.heading: Tax; deficiency; interest; penalty
sections.text: All deficiencies of the tax prescribed in subsection (1) of section 9-239 shall accrue interest and be subject to a penalty as provided for sales and use taxes in the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967.SourceLaws 1984, LB 949, ยง 71;R.S.Supp.,1984, ยง 9-197;Laws 1986, LB 1
